name: Twilight Ring of Lordship
tooltip:
Twilight Ring of Lordship

<name>, if you plan to go after the Abysall High Council again, then you'll need another Twilight ring of lordship.  Bring me more shards and signets and I'll make one for you.

Requirements:
- Abyssal Signet x 3
- Large Brilliant Shard x 5
